article_title: Much at stake in struggle for control of Kentucky House
article_text: An intense political struggle is under way in the Bluegrass State for control of the state House in the Nov. 4 elections. Democrats and Republicans agree on at least one thing: Much is at stake.

An intense political struggle is under way in the Bluegrass State for control of the state House in the Nov. 4 elections.
Democrats and Republicans agree on at least one thing: Much is at stake.
